channel.title: Lets make it happen on Plotkai Interactive
channel.description: Recent content in Lets make it happen on Plotkai Interactive

item.title: Token EAS Service
item.description: What is Token EAS ? It is a java based project that provides Edge Authentication and also provisions tokens.

item.title: About
item.description: Lets make it happen. When you want to give back to society, you put yourself out there and help. Your efforts may be small and unseen but they all make a difference only if we collaborate and make it together. Plotkai is here to work on Open Source Projetcs to give back to the developer society.
